name: 陳昭伶
objective: This course is designed to provide students with a firm foundation in business communication skills. Students will learn how to present a proposal, start a discussion, and promote company products in English. It is hoped that by the end of this course, students are equipped with sufficient knowledge of general and business English.
schedule:
The detailed schedule will be distributed on the first day of class.

Week 1: Course introduction and policy 
Week 2-4: Market research 
Week 5 Responding to questions during a presentation 
Week 6-7: Renegotiation of an agreement 
Week 8: Promoting collaboration 
Week 9: Midterm exam  
Week 10-11: Fact-based and emotion-based presentation 
Week 12-13: Defending ideas and describing consequences 
Week 14-15: Talking about performance 
Week 16-17: Job interviews 
Week 18: Review 

(The schedule is subject to change due to unforeseeable factors.)
scorePolicy:
1.School-wide English Proficiency Test: 20% 
2.Participation & Assignments & Quizzes 20% 
3.Midterm exam & Final exam 50% 
4.Attendance 10% (3% reduction per absence; Five unexcused absences from class will result in automatic failure of the course)
Please provide a valid proof of illness (medical certificate or record of hospitalization) within 10 days of the date of absence.
